languages.text: {n}Джай отстраняется и почти обиженно вздыхает.{/n} "Вы вольны называть наши отношения так, как вам нравится, шерин. Все же слова — это просто слова. Однако как вы позаботились обо мне, так и я хочу позаботиться о вас... Чуть сверх оговоренного. Вот, держите: скромный дар в благодарность за помощь. И пусть Великий и дальше оберегает пути, по которым вы ходите".

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай отстраняется и почти обиженно вздыхает.{/n} "Вы вольны называть наши отношения так, как вам нравится, шерин. Все же слова — это просто слова. Однако как вы позаботились обо мне, так и я хочу позабоиться о вас... Чуть сверх оговоренного. Вот, держите: скромный дар в благодарность за помощь. И пусть Великий и дальше оберегает пути, по которым вы ходите".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae draws back and huffs, seemingly offended.{/n} "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I have brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай отстраняется и почти обиженно вздыхает.{/n} "Вы вольны называть наши отношения так, как вам нравится, шерин. Все же слова — это просто слова. Однако как вы позаботились обо мне, так и я хочу позаботиться о вас... Чуть сверх оговоренного. Вот, держите: скромный дар в благодарность за помощь. И пусть Великий и дальше оберегает пути, по которым вы ходите".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae draws back and huffs, seemingly offended.{/n} "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would lie to take care of you... And go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. There you go, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

But you took good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I have brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊退了一步，哼了一声，似乎是被冒犯到了。{/n}“我们之间的关系，随便你怎么称呼都好，亲爱的。毕竟话语就像风一样，没有太大意义。但你曾对我照顾有加，所以我也希望能照顾到你……并稍微超出我们协议中的严格条款。收下吧，这是我带来的小礼物，带着我的感激之情。愿至高无上的神皇始终指引你的道路。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae draws back and huffs, seemingly offended.{/n} "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I have brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊退了一步，哼了一声，似乎是被冒犯到了。{/n}“我们之间的关系，随便你怎么称呼都好，亲爱的。毕竟话语就像风一样，没有太大意义。但你曾对我照顾有加，所以我也希望能照顾到你……并稍微超出我们协议中的严格条款。收下吧，这是我带来的小礼物，带着我的感激之情。愿至高无上的神皇始终指引你的道路。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae draws back and huffs, seemingly offended.{/n} "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I have brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

languages.text: {n}Jae retrocede y resopla, aparentemente ofendida.{/n} «Puede llamar como quiera a nuestra relación, shereen. Después de todo, las palabras se las lleva el viento. Pero ha cuidado bien de mí, y a mí también me gustaría cuidar bien de usted a cambio... e ir un poco más allá de los términos estrictos de nuestro acuerdo. Tome: un pequeño regalo como muestra de gratitud. Y que el Exaltado vigile los caminos que recorra».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae draws back and huffs, seemingly offended.{/n} "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I have brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae retrocede y resopla, aparentemente ofendida.{/n} «Puede llamar como quiera a nuestra relación, shereen. Después de todo, las palabras se las lleva el viento. Pero ha cuidado bien de mí, y a mí también me gustaría cuidar bien de usted a cambio... e ir un poco más allá de los términos estrictos de nuestro acuerdo. Tome: un pequeño regalo como muestra de gratitud. Y que el Exaltado vigile los caminos que recorra».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは気分を害したように身を引いた。{/n}「あたしたちの関係をどう呼ぼうと自由だよ結局のところ、言葉は風であり、ほとんど意味がないものだから。でも、あんたはあたしを気にかけてくれた。だから、あたしもあんたを気にかけたい。ここに、感謝のしるしとしてささやかな贈り物を持ってきた。そして、エグザルテッド・ワンが、あんたの進む道を見守ってくださいますように」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae draws back and huffs, seemingly offended.{/n} "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I have brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは気分を害したように身を引いた。{/n}「あたしたちの関係をどう呼ぼうと自由だよ結局のところ、言葉は風であり、ほとんど意味がないものだから。でも、あんたはあたしを気にかけてくれた。だから、あたしもあんたを気にかけたい。ここに、感謝のしるしとしてささやかな贈り物を持ってきた。そして、エグザルテッド・ワンが、あんたの進む道を見守ってくださいますように」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae schreckt mit einem Schnauben zurück. Du hast sie offenbar beleidigt.{/n} "Ihr dürft unsere Beziehung nennen, wie Ihr möchtet, Shereen. Worte sind schließlich nur Wind und bedeuten wenig. Doch Ihr habt Euch gut um mich gekümmert, daher möchte ich mich um Euch kümmern ... und leicht über die strikten Bedingungen unserer Vereinbarung hinausgehen. Hier, ich habe Euch ein kleines Geschenk als Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit mitgebracht. Und möge der Erhabene über die Pfade wachen, die Ihr beschreitet."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae draws back and huffs, seemingly offended.{/n} "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I have brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae schreckt mit einem Schnauben zurück. Du hast sie offenbar beleidigt.{/n} "Ihr dürft unsere Beziehung nennen, wie Ihr möchtet, Shereen. Worte sind schließlich nur Wind und bedeuten wenig. Doch Ihr habt Euch gut um mich gekümmert, daher möchte ich mich um Euch kümmern ... und leicht über die strikten Bedingungen unserer Vereinbarung hinausgehen. Hier, ich habe Euch ein kleines Geschenk als Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit mitgebracht. Und möge der Erhabene über die Pfade wachen, die Ihr beschreitet."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae recule en poussant un soupir indigné.{/n} « Vous pouvez qualifier notre relation de ce que vous voulez, shereen. Les mots sont aussi inconstants que le vent, après tout. Cependant, comme vous avez pris soin de moi, j'aimerais vous rendre la pareille... en outrepassant légèrement les termes stricts de notre accord. Tenez, je vous ai apporté un petit cadeau en guise de remerciement. Et puisse l'Exalté continuer de veiller sur les chemins que vous emprunterez. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae draws back and huffs, seemingly offended.{/n} "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I have brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae recule en poussant un soupir indigné.{/n} « Vous pouvez qualifier notre relation de ce que vous voulez, shereen. Les mots sont aussi inconstants que le vent, après tout. Cependant, comme vous avez pris soin de moi, j'aimerais vous rendre la pareille... en outrepassant légèrement les termes stricts de notre accord. Tenez, je vous ai apporté un petit cadeau en guise de remerciement. Et puisse l'Exalté continuer de veiller sur les chemins que vous emprunterez. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae geri çekilip alınmış bir tavırla somurtuyor.{/n} "İlişkimizi istediğin şekilde tanımlamakta özgürsün şirinim. Nihayetinde sözcüklerin ifade ettikleri anlam önemsizdir. Bana kol kanat gerdin, ben de aynısını senin için yapmak ve biraz da aramızdaki anlaşmanın belli şartlarının ötesine geçmek istiyorum. Sana minnetimin bir göstergesi olarak küçük bir armağan getirdim. Görkemli, aştığın yollarda seni kollayıp gözetsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae draws back and huffs, seemingly offended.{/n} "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I have brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae geri çekiliyor ve alınmış bir tavırla somurtuyor.{/n} "İlişkimizi istediğin şekilde tanımlamakta özgürsün şirinim. Nihayetinde sözcüklerin ifade ettikleri anlam önemsizdir. Bana kol kanat gerdin, ben de aynısını senin için yapmak ve aramızdaki anlaşmanın net şartlarının biraz da ötesine geçmek istiyorum. Sana minnetimin bir göstergesi olarak küçük bir armağan getirdim. Görkemli, geçtiğin yollarda seni kollayıp gözetsin."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
